trans-unit.source: Because omnivore provides a very thin wrapper around ATasm (and very little ATasm code was changed) it needs to creates files to do its work. These files will be created in the same directory as the source file, so the directory must be writeable.
trans-unit.target: Debido a que el omnívoro proporciona una envoltura muy delgada alrededor del ATasmo (y se cambió muy poco código del ATasmo)necesita crear archivos para hacer su trabajo.Estos archivos se crearán en el mismo directorio que el archivo fuente,por lo que el directorio debe ser escribible.

trans-unit.source: Binaries are available for Windows 7 and later (64-bit only) and Mac OS X 10.9 and later and at the home page or directly through the github releases page.
trans-unit.target: Binaries are available for Windows 7 and later (64-bit only) and Mac OS X 10.9 and later and at the home page or directly through the github releases page.

trans-unit.source: Binaries for linux are not currently available, although I would like to provide packages for Ubuntu, Linux Mint and Gentoo at some point.
trans-unit.target: Los binarios para linux no están disponibles actualmente,aunque me gustaría proporcionar paquetes para Ubuntu,Linux Mint y Gentoo en algún momento.

trans-unit.source: If you’re interested in hacking on the code or making bug fixes or improvements, you can install and run the source distribution.
trans-unit.target: If you’re interested in hacking on the code or making bug fixes or improvements, you can install and run the source distribution.

trans-unit.source: In addition to the Omnivore program itself, this module can be used in other projects. For example, Omnivore supplies a python front-end to the cross assembler ATasm, meaning you can compile 6502 code right from your python program.
trans-unit.target: Además del programa Omnívoro en sí,este módulo puede ser usado en otros proyectos.Por ejemplo,Omnivore suministra un front-end de pitón al ensamblador cruzado ATasm,lo que significa que puede compilar el código 6502 directamente desde su programa pitón.

trans-unit.source: Omnivore - the retrocomputing reverse engineering toolbox
trans-unit.target: Omnivore-la caja de herramientas de ingeniería inversa de retrocomputación

trans-unit.source: Omnivore 2.0 is still under heavy development. When it gets to a more stable state, I will create binaries for Windows and MacOS. These instructions will be for that time.
trans-unit.target: Omnívoro 2.0 está aún en pleno desarrollo.Cuando llegue a un estado más estable,crearé binarios para Windows y MacOS.Estas instrucciones serán para ese momento.

trans-unit.source: Omnivore is a cross-platform app for modern hardware (running linux, MacOS and Windows) to work with executables or media images of Atari 8-bit, Apple ][+, and other retrocomputer machines and game consoles.
trans-unit.target: Omnivore es una aplicación multiplataforma para que el hardware moderno (que ejecuta linux,MacOS y Windows)trabaje con ejecutables o imágenes multimedia de Atari 8-bit,Apple ][+,y otras máquinas retrocomputadoras y consolas de juegos.

trans-unit.source: Omnivore provides unified front-end to several 8-bit CPU and system emulators to provide a common set of control methods for both normal operation and debugging purposes. This is used as the basis for the emulation support in Omnivore.
trans-unit.target: Omnivore proporciona un front-end unificado a varios emuladores de CPU y sistemas de 8 bits para proporcionar un conjunto común de métodos de control tanto para el funcionamiento normal como para la depuración.Esto se utiliza como base para el soporte de emulación en Omnivore.

trans-unit.source: Omnivore will be able to be extended using plugins based on the Enthought Framework which are discovered automatically at runtime using setuptools plugins.
trans-unit.target: Omnivore will be able to be extended using plugins based on the Enthought Framework which are discovered automatically at runtime using setuptools plugins.

trans-unit.source: Omnivore, the 8-bit binary editor, emulator, and debugger Copyright (c) 2014-2018 Rob McMullen (feedback@playermissile.com)
trans-unit.target: Omnivore, the 8-bit binary editor, emulator, and debugger Copyright (c) 2014-2018 Rob McMullen (feedback@playermissile.com)

trans-unit.source: Running the Program
trans-unit.target: Ejecutar el programa

trans-unit.source: Should you change a cython file (e.g. omnivore/arch/antic_speedups.pyx), use the command
trans-unit.target: Si cambia un archivo cython (por ejemplo,omnivore/arch/antic_speedups.pyx),use el comando

trans-unit.source: The Cython extension is used to speed up some of the time-critical code (like repainting all the character graphics), but it is only required if you were going to debug or recompile those specific .pyx files. Cython is not needed for hacking on the python code.
trans-unit.target: La extensión Cython se utiliza para acelerar algunos de los códigos críticos para el tiempo (como repintar todos los gráficos de caracteres),pero sólo es necesaria si se va a depurar o recompilar esos archivos .pyx específicos.Cython no es necesario para hackear el código python.

trans-unit.target: El depurador incluye:

trans-unit.source: The plugin architecture is documented by Enthought, but is not terribly easy to understand. I intend to produce some sample plugins to provide some examples in case others would like to provide more functionality to Omnivore.
trans-unit.target: La arquitectura del plugin está documentada por Enthought,pero no es terriblemente fácil de entender.Tengo la intención de producir algunos plugins de muestra para proporcionar algunos ejemplos en caso de que otros quieran proporcionar más funcionalidad a Omnivore.

trans-unit.source: The segments attribute will contain a list of 3-tuples, each tuple being the start address, the end address, and the bytes for each segment of the assembly. A segment is defined as a contiguous sequence of bytes. If there is change of origin, a new segment will be created.
trans-unit.target: El atributo de los segmentos contendrá una lista de 3 tuplas,siendo cada tupla la dirección de inicio,la dirección de fin y los bytes de cada segmento del conjunto.Un segmento se define como una secuencia contigua de bytes.Si hay un cambio de origen,se creará un nuevo segmento.

trans-unit.source: To run on linux, you’ll have to have a Python 3.6 environment set up. How to do this will depend on your distribution, but there’s a good chance that if it is not installed already, your package manager will be able to install it for you.
trans-unit.target: To run on linux, you’ll have to have a Python 3.6 environment set up. How to do this will depend on your distribution, but there’s a good chance that if it is not installed already, your package manager will be able to install it for you.

trans-unit.source: Unified front-end providing common interface to control several 8 bit emulators
trans-unit.target: El front-end unificado proporciona una interfaz común para controlar varios emuladores de 8 bits

trans-unit.target: Uso

trans-unit.source: Virtualenv Setup
trans-unit.target: Configuración de Virtualenv

trans-unit.source: While producing the Player/Missile podcast, I have had many ideas about hacking code on the 8-bits like I used to as a kid. One of the tools I had was the Omnimon system monitor board by CDY Consulting, an add-on board for the Atari 800 that provided a ROM-resident monitor similar to what was provided in the Apple ][+ hardware. In fact, I originally named this program Omnimon but felt that would be too confusing as there are people in the 8-bit community who still use the original Omnimon hardware. Using the prefix “Omni-” is my tribute to all the fun I had with the Omnimon hardware.
trans-unit.target: While producing the Player/Missile podcast, I have had many ideas about hacking code on the 8-bits like I used to as a kid. One of the tools I had was the Omnimon system monitor board by CDY Consulting, an add-on board for the Atari 800 that provided a ROM-resident monitor similar to what was provided in the Apple ][+ hardware. In fact, I originally named this program Omnimon but felt that would be too confusing as there are people in the 8-bit community who still use the original Omnimon hardware. Using the prefix “Omni-” is my tribute to all the fun I had with the Omnimon hardware.

trans-unit.source: Windows & MacOS
trans-unit.target: Windows & MacOS

trans-unit.source: Windows doesn’t come with a C compiler, but happily, Microsoft provides a cut-down version of their Visual Studio compiler just for compiling Python extensions! Download and install it from here.
trans-unit.target: Windows doesn’t come with a C compiler, but happily, Microsoft provides a cut-down version of their Visual Studio compiler just for compiling Python extensions! Download and install it from here.

trans-unit.source: You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License along with this program; if not, write to the Free Software Foundation, Inc., 51 Franklin Street, Fifth Floor, Boston, MA 02110-1301 USA.
trans-unit.target: Debería haber recibido una copia de la Licencia Pública General de GNU junto con este programa;si no,escriba a la Free Software Foundation,Inc.,51 Franklin Street,Fifth Floor,Boston,MA 02110-1301 USA.

trans-unit.source: Your version of python must be able to build C extensions, which should be automatic in most linux and on OS X. You may have to install the python development packages on linux distributions like Ubuntu or Linux Mint.
trans-unit.target: Tu versión de python debe ser capaz de construir extensiones C,que deberían ser automáticas en la mayoría de linux y en OS X.Puede que tengas que instalar los paquetes de desarrollo de python en distribuciones de linux como Ubuntu o Linux Mint.
